Blog.post: DEAR LORD , r u ther lisenin 2 mah lil prayer ionno exactly wut 2 sai .... i bean told dat u loved mee here mee wen i call wud help mee if i fall i shud let u hav ur wai ... wut i ghess im tryin 2 sai iz i need u in mah life i kno im tired ov livin in da past ... i wud lyk 2 take a chance on a change dwn deep inside i kno dat dis iz 1 dats gonna last soo here it iz ... here iz mah heart itz been broken itz been wounded buh iall giv it all 2 u if u wud luv mee luv mee ... here iz mah lyf if u want it u can hav it i will giv it all 2 u if u wud luv mee cuz luv iz evrithin i need DEAR CHILD , im ryt here thru ur worries thru ur tears ive bean waitin 4 u 2 call mah name ... all u kno did i hear u if u turn 2 mee and trust mah word itz tru u will neva b da slave ... well im standin here 2 sai dat u need mee in ur lyf cuz i kno dat u cant make it on ur own if u take da chance let mee change u deep inside ... i promise u will neva b alone soo here it iz here iz mah heart itz bean broken itz been wounded buh iall giv it all 2 u if u wud luv mee luv mee ... here iz mah lyf if u want it u can hav it i will giv it all 2 u if u wud luv mee kuz luv iz evrithin u need!! if u turn 2 mee and kno dat i am allwaiiz standin by ... i giv it all 4 u so cud this gentle peace inside .. i will fallow u in evrithin u r ... i am ur father ... ooh u r mah saviour ... and in da matters ov da heart i am taking urz and u r takin mine here is mah heart itz been broken itz ben wounded buh i will giv it all 2 u if u wud luv mee luv mee ... here iz mah life if u want it u can hav it i will giv it all 2 u if u luv mee kuz luv iz evrithin i need .........

is this the end or chapter 2?? well chapter 2!! hehe newaiiz yahh from yesterdai!! afta i had a seizure from laffing i had a normal dai until lunch tym datz wen mah brilliance started 2 shine!! newaiiz i wuz lyk reelli happy ionno y buh yeh i wuz ... soo pat dugo iz a dik n evri1 knoz it hehe ... well he had a meat pie n he had almost finished it devouring it lyk it wuz dear to a lion!! yeh well i walked past him smiling ( az usuall ) and den he goez 2 mee " aye u allowed in your mums room " ? n den i sed " yes " he proclaims " well wake mee up in da mourin "! and followed by dis wuz a huge eruption ov laffter and chorusing!! ( to say oohz , barracking , to chorus ) n den i sed in a come back " well u reelli lyk mah dad dont u and ur DILF"!!! n den da whole group ov our fwends started cheering mee on n sayin im da man n he wuz gettin pretty annoyed at dat moment he sed yahh daughter ide lyk 2 fuck"n den i go haha " yahh u lyk dat filf action 2 aye ... nowonder u allwaiiz giv shane deep penetration up d ass"!! at dat moment dugo had a sour face and dispised mee 4 rocking him and making mee da king ov comebacks!! n den anthony another clown buh da funniest person he iz such a kewl guy started laffing out crazily and mocked dugo 2 a further extent n den dugo attempted 2 drop da last ov his meatpie on his head!! buh den i shouted " TAKE A BITE" n den anthony snapped his greedy jaws at the dead flesh and pastry known az ... the meatpie!! dugo pulled away kwikly n walked 2 mee den i smashed it in his face and da sauce went all ova him and on his shirt and unshaven face!! after this he got angry and stormed 2 da toilet!! buh i ran away laffing with da otherz n yes having a great dai soo far i had yet 2 expect more...!!

well da first dai ov skewl ( 4 mee ) lolz ... wuz kinda kewl kuz lyk stuff happned...................lolz yahh kuz yeh lyk in pe we wer tokn bout lyk teen sexual stuff n lyk itz a new topic n yeh da whole class roared in an manner not known to da normal man " YESSSSSSSSSS " they proceeded n yeh lolz dey wer lyk a pack of wolves!! newaiiz da teacher calmed down da class n den we wer lyk full laffin coz our teacher iz kinda young lyk in his late 20's soo we all thought in our lil minds dat dis guy has had a lot ov it ;) yeh lyk kuz hez young n proli kno wut most ov da guys ther r goin thru lyk sexual activity n lots ov hormones racing ... newaiiz yahh we wer tokn bout sum romantic n mature lov sayin dat romantic iz 4 young ppl and how ther relationships wit another person r short lived n mature iz lyk long term n stuff n some guy named jim told uz dat hez been in a mature luv relationship n lyk it wuz intimate n stuff n den wen he broke up he wuz shocked n depressed n lyk in an empty shell n stuff n lyk he sed dat if he went in2 anotha relationship it wuznt ryt n he wud go in and outta dem lyk breakfast cereal at dat moment evr1 bursted out in a great laafter including mee hu wuznt payin attention lolz n den omgosh da teacher wuz in deep need ov oxygen!! lyk hayden da class clown started laffin out da hardest and evri1 stopped buh he kept raging on n den evri1 cracked up coz he wuz crackin up!! n den we settled dwn n den we started tokn bout american pie n da terms dey used n den we sed milf n had a laff n den hayden cried out again ... almost laffing til his hed poped and den we all went quiet once again n den he started banging on da desk laffing hard ... tom sittn next 2 him asked wutz funni now n den he gasped 4 air n sed .... d .... di .... dilf!!!!!! LMFAO we all cracked up da most and 4 da entire period did not learn nethin sept 4 laafin at hayden and his witty remarks! at d end he cracked up again n goez lolz omgosh cocopops 4 black chicks ... man wut bout white chicks n den sum1 screamed out loud " MAN DONT U KNO ITZ RICE BUBBLES!! " at dat spur ov d moment i fell on da floor holding my stomache u bopped mah head twice az in epilepsy!! and yes dats pasrt 1 ov dis series!!

itz 3 pm n im rytin a song n all u party ppl can clap along , yall kno mah rap mah rappin iz ryhmin chimin mor diamonds den mario winans i go fake pass n swish on 3 u dnt kno wutz reel u just wanna b mee i gte 2 mah crib at 7pm enter da house n wut do i c again , traces ov brothers blood on mah stair cases on da wall i think he got wasted and tasted da same medicine az luke pedison hu used a light bulb made by thomas eddison , i go 2 his stuff he b reddy or not cuz all da neighbours here pop drop n shot frm da east 2 da west u b screamin mah name steglles in da club printed on da wall ov fame now let da crowd go wild from nite 2 dai put dem hands in d air i end da verse 2dai i sai... well thers da verse ov a rap mah fwend made just den itz up 2 u guys out ther 2 finish it off!! hehe ( he wants a chorus )

well 2 start off with ... on fridai nite i couldnt sleep cuz i reelli wanted 2 go out andhav fun bcoz mah week had been pretty bad n boring so i went to sleep reelli wanting 2 go out ncoz i had muny!! aheehee!! newaiiz yahh i called some of mah fwends da nxt mournin if deywanted 2 go out buh i had no1... i felt reelli bored lyk reelli ... newaiiz i called 1 of mah older fwends and finnally i got invited 2 cruise around in mah fwends car a hot black civic!! yahh lolz ... yahh it wuz ryan newaiiz ryan mee n shannon went 2 pick n payless 2 find some parts 4 his car dat he wanted 2 do up n register it coz it needs quite a bit ov work yahh sooo later on mee n ryan had quite an exquizt tym lookin 4 parts on trashed cars and he found an airfilter tube thingy and he wer on our wai though jordan did not find ne parts sooo we went around anothr wrecker buh we just cruised round instead newaiiz we went 2 repco nlooked 4 more buh yeah dint find nething very interesting sept 4 da hot chick in da pink skirt ( oohz very kinky ) lolz ... i dint sai or think dat!! lolz!! yahh sooo at round 4 we went bak2 shannons house and ate some chicken n rice which wuz a great delicasy made by his mother hu made a tremendous meal out of just chicken!! wow i wish i could do that buh newaiiz afta dat wenwe ate half da chickens wich wer " abov da rim " ov da bowl witout da rice hehe we went outsideand looked at da car wich wuz pretty kewlness az i looked i saw dat wut he needed wuz only minor things newaiiz i played ball by mahself wit his ring and hit da pulsar lyk twice ahehe yahh n den we all started dunkin da ring n yeah we went 2 call chris and pick him up from da church nearda all saints gurls skewl oppposite go lo in livo ... yahh newaiiz we picked him up n den we went2 his crib wich wuz pretty classy and den stayed there and den it wuz 6:30 and ryan called mahmum and asked if i can sleep ova kuz we wer supposed 2 go clubbing trying 2 make up 4 elite wichi dint go * GRRRR * ... so mah mum sed yes n i exchanged dat wit a thank u n den we wer on ourwai ... 2 blacktown to go c if some dude can fix chrisz sound system coz itz stuffed or sumtyn and we went in his car which wuz evn betta den ryanz lolz newaiiz we stayed ther 4 quite a bit and it wuz cold n yeah i wuz freezing!! den wen we left it wuz lyk 8:30 n den we got bak n waited 4 some grub ... we wer starved and den chrisz sis karen wuz ther hu i membered from agez ago n she wuz kinda cute not hot kuz yea datz wut mah perspective ov her wuz ... yahh apparentlyshe lykz mah cuz!! haha go sash!! newaiiz yahh ryan mah dumass ov a fwend lyk wuz bein a dick evrtym he sees a chick mah age or sumtyn he allwaiiz trys 2 make mee and " her " blush n try 2 get us 2 lyk each other wich nevr works buh iz extremly embarrissin ... newaiiz afta a longwait we finnally ate ... steak and rice wit some salad and da all famous and favorite " cinnigang " ( i fink das how u spell it ) afta a while eating wit bulging stomaches we left 4some guys crib 2 get some ... ghess wut " weed " and ryan hu iz suppposed 2 b da 1 a respected most ther n mostly allwaiiz wuz innocent sed he waznt gonna take ne ... and i belived him ... and den it wuz lyk 11 n we picked up some chick shannon knowz and wuz such a sweet chick buh weni met her she iz kinda bad gurl lyk bad n nawty!! yahh afta dat we went 2 some guys house hu wuzcurry or sumtyn buh yeh kinda kewl i stayed in ryanz car tokn 2 mellissa and toked 4 ages n den i stopped tokn and sat ther n dey wer havn a dilemma bout how 2 smoke it and evr1 wanted a bongsept 4 mee ryan n katrina da sweet chick n den afta sortin all dat out afta lyk an hour n a halfdey finnally got da bottle n da hose n da curry guy proceeded 2 cut da plant!! and den dey went outside 2 smoke it n ryan went az well n i wuz shocked i tawt dat he wuz gonna watch buh knowingwut i know now i shouldnt hav been ther 4 he had taken some and i knew bcoz i heard him yell " OH FUCK " lyk reelli loud n den yeah i knew it wuz him n went he came back inside he wuz bloodshoteyes and going crazy n talkin shit!! i wuz lyk shocked n pissed buh in dat tym i wuz in da housewit katrina i got 2 tok n kno her more n gettin kinda hot!! buh yea afta dat chris came in wit ryann den shannon n da curry dude buh yeah chris went 2 sleep lyk a baby kuz he wuz outta it serzli n den afta a while we left!! n den i went 2 sleep at 4 am thinkin bout all dis n gettin a bit pissed and i couldnt tell no1 newaiiz yahh dey had some weed n i kept away!! sooo afta all i ama pretty innocent kid!! yahh dat wuz mah weekend!! pretty handsome!! n entertainin buh i reelliwanted 2 kno y mah 23yr old fwend ryan tryin 2 pick up young 17yr old katrina!! mayb it wuz daweed in him!!

well 2dai i went 2 c 1 of mah fwends n yes he is a kewl fwend n yeh lyk we knew each otha lyk reelli well n we practically grew up 2getha ... buh 2dai it wuz diffrent he had all his fwends the from his skewl n i knew em az well ... n den i sed sum stuff dat mite hav offended him buh wher i come from n d environment dat i liv in wouldnt n yeh he got pissed n i dint know it ... i went 2 plai sum footy n den he dint come sooo afta dat i went home n den on da net only a couple ov hours ago he went off at mee n i dnt kno y lyk it wuz weird n he asked qeztionz dat wer weird n lyk at dat moment he reelli hated mee n wuz serz ... n den at d end he reeli went off at mee n den went off line i wuz lyk ohhkay kuz he wuz bein a big bitch ... after a while i met a reelli super chick n yeh shez da best n funni again n yeah sooo at d end ov dis stowie it wuz pretty good!! wellz all i hav 2 sai iz dat dont take ur best frends 4 granted ...

well ... 2dai it rained and yes evri1 knows how much i hate rain itz mucks all mah plans up n makes mee misrable!! BLAH!! i slept until 12:00 and dat wuz da good bit ... i ate lunch wit mah parents 4 d first tym in lyk 3 yrz and yes after dat i had a crappy day which wuz soo disturbing i degraded myself to a nothing by bumming my ass off ... binge eating playing ps2 all dai and using my fone 2 da max witout using credit!! weirdness!! i dont think i hav done dat b4!! and yeh i wish it hadnt rained and i could go out wit fwends!! ohh wellz!! til txm tym!!

yet again i hav started a new blog ... my gosh i dont know why i do it ... but yes again i hav had a tremendous day of nothingness dat has completely wasted " half my life " quoteth my father. i dont know y but sleeping in until 1:30 us such a great ... i dunno wutz it called kuz im sleeping ... hehe newaiiz yeh itz good kuz i woke up knowing dat i hav d house 2 mahself ... grinning i walked out of mah room seeing mah sister and her fwends!! oh no da day all gone rong!! yes later on i went in2 da shower and den bout 5 minz in ther it went cold ... man oh man how i wuz frustrated and completly " discombopulated " 4 d whole day ... ARRRGH!! yes d day wuz bad eating nothing but corn chips and coke ... yes my bladder wuz full but i dint get up until da show after " mysterious ways " finished. Although it had been a very bad day it turned brighter wen i found dat i got 3 msgz on my fone ... hahaha i know itz not much ov a big deal but yes i tawt it wuz kewlness in a happy cup ...
